ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE LOUISE CHARRON, C.C., of Ottawa, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
